Name: The character's name is Joe Friday.
Occuptation: Joe Friday is a Detective with the Los Angeles Police Department (LAPD).
Rank: His official rank is Detective Sergeant.
Location: Joe Friday lives in Los Angeles, CA.
Partner: Joe's partner is Officer Frank Smith.
Opening Narration: This is the city, Los Angeles, California. I work here. I'm a cop.
Carry piece: Joe carries a .38 snub-nose Smith & Wesson Model 10 revolver.
Date of Birth: Joe Friday was born on April 2, 1917.
